title: BRIEF-State Bank Of India To Sell 3.5% Of Stake In SBI Life
text:
BRIEF-State Bank Of India To Sell 3.5% Of Stake In SBI Life

Stock Markets 41 minutes ago (Sep 11, 2019 18:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-State Bank Of India To Sell 3.5% Of Stake In SBI Life Sept 11 (Reuters) - State Bank of India : * STATE BANK OF INDIA SAYS CENTRAL BOARD PANEL APPROVED SALE OF 35 MILLION + 10 MILLION SHARES, OR 3.5%, WITH AN OVERSUBSCRIPTION UPTO 1%, OF STAKE IN SBI LIFE * STATE BANK OF INDIA SAYS SALE DONE TO ACHIEVE MINIMUM PUBLIC SHAREHOLDING OF 25%

BRIEF-State Bank Of India To Sell 3.5% Of Stake In SBI Life
